There are some big laws that are direct from the EU that's changed our country, 1 of the main laws would be the Human rights law. This is something that I would like to see just adopted into the UK law, but I can see the Con's changing a few things to reduce our own human rights. VAT laws can be changed and fishing laws will become very important to our country, mainly the EU regulations Its the laws that's are shared between all EU country's that can be changed that are important (Think there is about 28, but will need to watch how these will be changed or if we adopt them into our own laws)
Buckle up folks.. we are in for an interesting ride...but whatever the outcome, it cannot be worse than being under the thumb of the unelected elite in Brussels.

Let's do it everyone, it's what most of us voted for isn't it. People are entitled to their opinions and its no less racist to deride outers by calling them thick and stupid. The vote was for out so suck it up! Its my guess everything will be rosy!
